name: ATK Boost
desc: (Support) Grants [{+}ATK II] to all allies within the target location and grants immunity to [Attack Attribute Debuffs], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Absolute Domain
desc: (Support) Performs [Alert] on a 1-tile radius around the character, dealing 70% DMG and interrupting actions once an enemy enters this area. Can be activated up to 2 times per round.

name: Aim
desc: (Support) [Instant] Gains [{+}Crit II] and [Ignore Dodge] for 1 turn.

name: Air Raid
desc: Gains [Jump] and [Climb]. Before attacking, if the starting [tile] and target [tile] have a height difference of more than 2, Crit increases by an additional 30%.

name: Air of Royalty
desc: (Reaction) DMG taken from Melee attacks decreases by 30%.

name: Alacrity
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Alacrity‚Äù allies in battle, increases ATK by 10%, DEF by 20%, and Crit by 15%.

name: Alert Shot
desc: (Physical DMG) Performs [Alert] on a 3x3 area in the target direction, and deals 100% DMG once the enemy enters this area. Can be activated up to 2 times per round.

name: Ambush
desc: (Passive) When performing an active attack, if the target is [Unharmed], deals 20% Physical DMG. When performing a [back attack] on [unharmed] targets, additionally inflicts [{x}Passive Skills] for 1 turn.

name: Anesthetic
desc: (Passive) After attacking, inflicts 1 stack of [Infection] on the target. When actively using [class skill] to hit targets with 5 or more stacks of [Infection], inflicts [Sleep] after attacking. The effect lasts for 1 turn.

name: Anger of Icefield
desc: (Physical DMG) Alexei selects 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range to charge at, deals 50% DMG, and inflicts [Stunned] for 1 turn. Additionally, he deals 50% [Ice] [AoE DMG] to all enemies within 2 tiles around the target. After attacking, he gains [Warrior of Frost] for 2 turns.

name: Another Pint!
desc: (Healing) [Instant]. Rawiyah recovers 60% of lost HP and gains [Tipsy] for 2 turns.

name: Arm Bracers
desc: (Passive) When attacked from the [Side], increases DEF by 30%.

name: Armor Eroder
desc: (Piercing DMG) Single-target attack. Deals (Piercing DMG] equal to 30% of the target's HP and then inflicts [{-}P.DEF II] and [{-}M.DEF II] for 2 turns.

name: Armor-Piercing Strike (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and inflicts [{-}P.DEF I] and [{-}M.DEF I] on the target, lasting for 2 turns.

name: Armor-piercing Shot
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 150% DMG to 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range around the character. Before attacking, gains [Shield Break II].

name: Arrow of Aeolus
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. LilyWill deals 60% DMG with [Curved Shot]. She deals Magical DMG equal to 40% of her P.ATK to all enemies within 1 tile around the target, inflicting 3 stacks of [Infection] if DMG is dealt

name: Arrow of Aeolus - Gale Break
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Lilywill deals 150% DMG, inflicts 2 stacks of [Infection], which immediately triggers the [Infection] effect. Before attacking, she gains [Highland] advantage.

name: Arrow of Ambush
desc: Increases ATK by 25% when attacking an enemy from the [side or behind].

name: Arrow of Guardian Convallaria
desc: (Physical DMG) Performs [Alert] within a 3x4 area in the target direction. Deals 120% DMG and interrupts actions once an enemy enter this area.

name: Assault
desc: (Support) [Instant] Gains [{+}Crit I], [{+}Crit DMG I], and [ 2A Move II] for 1 turn.

name: Axe of Boldness
desc: Increases [AoE DMG] by 35%.

name: BOOOOOM!
desc: (Magical DMG) Beryl cannot move before performing this skill. She attacks any enemies within 2 tiles 5 times, with hits randomly divided amongst those within range. Every hit deals 30% [Fire] [AoE DMG] to all enemies within 1 tile of the target, with a 50% chance of inflicting [Scorch].

name: Backstab
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. Before attacking, if the character performs a [back attack], inflicts [{x}Reaction Skills] onthe target for 1 turn.

name: Bandage
desc: (Healing) [Instant]. Single-target healing. Heals 30% HP.

name: Bang! (Ranged)
desc: (Basic Attack) Single-target attack. Beryl deals physical DMG equal to 80% of her M.ATK. There is a 30% chance to inflict [Stunned] for 1 turn.

name: Barricade Fight
desc: (Passive) If there is any [Item] within 1 tile of the character, increases ATK by 15% and allows the character to move again by 2 tiles after initiating an Active Attack.

name: Battle Fever
desc: (Passive) After initiating an Active Attack, the character takes 15% less DMG. Dealing a Crit DMG additionally decreases DMG taken by 25% for 1 turn.

name: Battle Flag of Convallaria
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Sword of Convallaria" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Battle Flag of Iria
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Iria" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Battle Flag of Papal States
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Papal States" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Battle Flag of Vlder
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Vlder" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Battle Flag of the Union
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "The Union" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

name: Battlefield Healing
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. Upon receiving an active attack, heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage within a 2-tile radius of the character by 100% of M.DEF.

name: Blade of Ambush
desc: Gains [Climb]. Increases Crit by 25% when attacking an enemy from the [side or behind].

name: Blazing
desc: (Passive) At the end of the turn, inflicts [Scorch] on 1 random [Injured] enemy within a 3-tile radius of the character, lasting for 2 turns.

name: Blessed Shield
desc: Gains [Block]. When the character has 3 or more [buffs], physical DMG taken is decreased by 15% and [block] chance is increased to 100%.

name: Blessed Spear
desc: Increases P.ATK by 15%. Increases the range of the character's [basic attack] by 1 tile when having 3 or more [buffs].

name: Blessing
desc: (Healing) Heals all allies within a 2-tile radius of the target. Recovers 30% of HP and converts 2 random [debuffs] into [Level 1 Buffs], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Block Counter
desc: (Reaction) When receiving a melee attack from [front or side], there is a 100% chance to trigger [Block]. This leads to a [Strike Back] with [basic attack], dealing 70% physical DMG to the attacker. This effect can be activated 1 time per round.

name: Bottoms Up
desc: Increases Rawiyah's DMG by 16%. At the start of the turn or during a strike back, there is a 70% chance to recover 40% of her lost HP and gain [Tipsy]. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.

name: Brutebear Blood
desc: Alexei becomes immune to [{x}Resolve]. His ATK is increased by 10% and he ignores the effects of [Frosty] tiles. Alexei possesses [Unlimited Resolve] until the start of the next turn, his [Trait] attribute bonuses double. This effect has a CD of 7 turns and cannot be dispelled or immunized.

name: Brutebear Counter
desc: (Reaction) Performs a [Strike Back] when hit by an active attack from the [front or side], dealing 70% physical DMG to the attacker. The effect can be activated up to 2 times per round.

name: Burning Bridges
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. Before attacking, gains [Offensive Stance] for 2 turns.

name: Burning Grenade
desc: (Piercing DMG) Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% of the target's HP to all enemies within 1 tile around the target tile and changes the tiles into [burning] for 2 turns.

name: Burnout
desc: (Magical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 140% DMG. If the enemy has [Scorch], the DMG dealt increases to 160%.

name: Casual Search
desc: (Support) [Instant] skill. Beryl gains 1 random [Luxite Skill]. The skill remains available for 2 turns.

name: Catching Fire
desc: Edda performs [Assisting Attack] against all enemies within 4 tiles of herself, dealing 30% physical DMG. The skill can be used up to 1 time per round.

name: Charge Pursuit
desc: (Physical DMG) [Instant]. Charges at 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range around the character, dealing 30% DMG. Gains immunity to [Preempt].

name: Charged Attack (Curved)
desc: (Basic Attack) Fires a [Curved Shot] which deals 85% physical DMG and increases the DMG of the next skill by 15%.

name: Charged Attack (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and increases the DMG of the next skill by 15%.

name: Charged Bayonet
desc: (Passive) At the start of the turn, if the character is not within the enemy's [threat range], gains [Bayonet Charge]. When [Bayonet Charge] is active and the character lands a single-target attack on enemies with [The Hanged Men's Mark], increases DMG by 30% and gains 30% [Life Steal].

name: Charging Spear
desc: Increases HP and P.DEF by 15%. Increases ATK by an additional 15% if the character moves before attacking.

name: Chuu Chuu Chuu!
desc: (Magical DMG) Beryl gains [Armor Piercing] before attacking, then deals 50% DMG to the target 3 times.

name: Close Quarter Release
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Nergal deals 110% DMG and knocks the target back by 4 tiles. Then, he deals 50% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 3x3 area in the target direction, and inflicts [{-}SPD I] for 1 turn.

name: Cloud-Piercing Arrow
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 140% DMG with [Curved Shot].

name: Co-Attack
desc: (Passive) For each ally within a 2-tile radius of the character, ATK increases by 5%, up to 15%.

name: Co-Defense
desc: (Passive) For each ally within a 2-tile radius of the character, DEF increases by 10%, up to 40%.

name: Come On, Everybody!
desc: (Support) Maitha restores 20% HP and grants [{+}ATK I]and [{+}P.DEF I] to all allies within a 3-tile radius. She takes [physical attacks] from the enemy for allies within a 2-tile radius for 2 turns.

name: Corruption
desc: (Passive) At the end of the turn, inflicts 2 random [Level 1 Attribute Debuffs] on 1 random enemy within a 3-tile radius of the character, lasting for 2 turns.

name: Counterattack
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack from the [front or side], performs a basic attack to [Strike Back] if the attacker is within range, dealing 70% of basic attack's DMG. The effect can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Counterattack Mode
desc: (Support) Adds 20% of P.ATK to P.DEF and M.DEF, increases Strike Back DMG by 50%, gains [Preempt], and increases Strike Back Range by 2 tiles, lasting for 2 turns.

name: Counterattack Storm
desc: (Support) The character's Strike Back Range is increased by 2 tiles. When performing a Strike Back, physical DMG is increased by 85%, and the character gains 1 Strike Back Count and [Connterattack] This effect lasts for 2 turns.

name: Covering Shot
desc: (Support) Performs [Assisting Attack] against all enemies within 4 tiles of the character, dealing 80% DMG. The skill can be used up to 2 times per round.

name: Crescendo Combo
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 30% DMG and dispels 2 [buffs] on the target, then performs [Pursuit], dealing 130% DMG.

name: Crippling Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 115% DMG and inflicts [{-}ATK II] and [{-}Move II] for 2 turns.

name: Crippling Blow
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 130% DMG and inflicts [{-}SPD II] for 2 turns.

name: Crit Command
desc: (Aura) Increases Crit by 20% for other allies within 2 tiles around the character.

name: Critical Enhancement
desc: (Support) Grants [{+}Crit II] to allies and grants immunity to [Disruption], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Critical Moment
desc: (Reaction) When the character is [Dying], [Dodges] all single-target attacks for 1 turn. At the start of the turn, recovers 50% HP. CD: 7 turns.

name: Critical Strike (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 50% physical DMG 2 times and increases Crit by 15% before attacking.

name: Crumbled Order
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Drifter" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%.

desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 150% DMG. Before attacking, the character gains [Shield Break II].

name: Curse
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. Upon receiving an active attack, inflicts [Vulnerable II] on the attacker for 2 turns.

name: Curved Shot (Curved)
desc: (Basic Attack) Fires a [Curved Shot] which deals 85% Physical DMG.

name: Cutie
desc: (Reaction) Decreases [Ranged DMG] taken by Beryl by 25% and [AoE DMG] taken by 40%.

name: Damage Enhancement
desc: (Support) Grants an ally character [{+}ATK II] and immunity to [Attack Attribute Debuffs]), lasting for 2 turns.

name: Dance of Encouragement
desc: (Support) Gains [Dance of Encouragement). Effect: Increases DMG by 15% for other allies within 5 tiles around the character and grants 30% [Life Steal], lasting for 3 turns.

name: Dance of the Butterfly
desc: Increases ATK by 12%. At the end of the turn, dispels 1 [debuff] from 3 random allies within 3 tiles around the character and grants them 1 [Level 1 Buff], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Dark Ripple
desc: (Magical DMG) Deals 70% [AoEDMG] to all enemies within a 2-tile radius of the target and inflicts [{x}Passive Skills] and [{x}Reaction Skills], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Dark Withering
desc: (Magical DMG) Inflicts [Life Loss] equal to 50% of M.ATK to all enemies within a 2-tile radius of the target and inflicts [{-}Healing Received], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Dash
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 110% DMG. Before attacking, DMG is increased by 8% for every 1 tile traversed, up to 40%.

name: Dawnlight
desc: (Magical DMG) Single-target attack. Dantalion deals Magical DMG equal to 130% of his P.ATK. Before attacking, 2 random [Buffs] on the target become [Level 1 Attribute Debuffs] for 1 turn.

desc: (Mixed DMG) Dantalion deals 40% physical DMG to all enemies in the target direction within a range of 3x2 tiles and inflicts [{x}Healing Received] for 2 turns. Another attack is then initiated which deals Magical DMG equal to 40% of his P.ATK and dispels 2 [Buffs].

name: Dazzling Light
desc: Gains [Block]. The character can also block [magical attacks]. P.ATK is increased by 9%.

name: Deadly Aim
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Nungal prepares for 1 turn and then deals 160% DMG to the enemy, which ignores [Block]. When attacking enemies with [The Hanged Men's Mark], increases Crit by 60%. [The Hanged Men's Mark] is cleared after landing a Crit Hit.

name: Dedication
desc: (Passive) After initiating an Active Attack, the character recovers 15% HP for all other allies within a 2-tile radius.

name: Defender
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 10%.

name: Defense (AoE)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active AoE Attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 30%.

name: Defense (Back Attack)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. When hit by a [back attack], DMG taken is additionally decreased by 30%.

desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active Magical Attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 15%.

name: Defense (Physical)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active Physical Attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 15%.

name: Defense (Ranged)
desc: (Reaction) When hit by a ranged attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 25%.

name: Defense Boost
desc: (Support) Grants [ /A P.DEF II] to all allies within the target location and grants immunity to [Defense Attribute Debuffs], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Defense Enhancement
desc: (Support) Grants [ /\ P.DEF II] to allies and grants immunity to [Defense Attribute Debuffs]), lasting for 2 turns.

name: Defensive Stance
desc: (Support) [Instant] Gains a [Physical Shield] with value equal to 25% of HP and [Block Enhancement] for 2 turns.

desc: (Magical DMG) Deals magical DMG equal to 80% P.ATK to all enemies within a 3x3 area in the target direction and inflicts [{-}ATK II] for 2 turns.

name: Depression
desc: Increases MLATK by 9%. At the end of the turn, locks onto 2 random enemies within a 4-tile radius of the character to inflict 1 random [Level 2 Attribute Debuff] for 2 turns.

desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 50% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 4-tile radius around the character and inflicts 2 random [Level 2 Attribute Debuffs] for 2 turns.

desc: (Healing) The character dispels 3 [debuffs], recovers 40% HP, and gains [{+}P.DEF II] and [ /A M.DEF II]. The character takes attacks for all other allies within 2 tiles around the character and increases the [Trait] effect to 200%

name: Dharana
desc: (Passive) At the start of the turn, if there are no enemies within a 2-tile radius of the character, gains [{+}Crit II] for 1 turn.

desc: Increases P.ATK by 9% and P.DEF by 9%. At the end of the turn, if the character is [Healthy] and within the foe's threat range, gains [Disdain]. Effect: Decreases DMG taken by 20% for 1 turn. Effect CD: 3 turns.

desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and dispels 2 [buffs] on the target.

name: Dispelling Strike (Ranged)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and dispels 2 [buffs] on the target.

name: Divine Storm Axe
desc: Increases [AoE DMG) by 20%. When defeating any target, casts an attack, dealing 40% physical DMG to all enemies within 1 tile around the character.

name: Dominate
desc: (Passive) When attacking, if the character's HP Percentage is higher than the target's, the character's ATK is increased by 12%.

name: Draconic Flash Step
desc: (Physical DMG) Selects 1 spot within a cross-shaped range around the character, charges to the location, and deals 80% DMG to all enemies along the line, ignoring any blocks. After the

name: Dual Blade Strike (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 50% physical DMG 2 times.

name: Eagle Eye
desc: (Support) [Instant] [basic attack] Range increases by 1 tile. P.ATK increases by 10%. Before attacking, gains the [Highland] advantage for 3 turns.

name: Eerie Footwork
desc: (Reaction) When [Healthy], after receiving a single-target attack, teleports behind the attacker, initiates a [strike back], which deals 70% DMG. Gains [Dodge] for 1 turn. When [Injured], triggers [Dodge]. CD: 3 turns.

name: Emergency Dodge
desc: (Passive) At the end of the turn, if the characteris [Injured], gains [Dodge] for 2 turns. CD: 3 turns.

name: Enchanting Dance
desc: (Support) [Instant] Swaps positions with any character within 3 tiles and the character gains [ /A Move II] and [Shift] for 1 turn.

name: Endless Dawn
desc: (Mixed DMG) Dantalion deals 40% physical DMG 3 times. He deals Magical DMG equal to 50% P.ATK to the first enemy in each column within a 3x3 area in the target direction, knocks them hack bv 2 tiles, and dispels 1 [Buff].

name: Endurance Activation
desc: (Reaction) When receiving healing, gains [DMG Reduction II] for 2 turns.

name: Endure
desc: (Reaction) Takes 50% less [DoT].

name: Endure Pain
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. When [Injured], the DMG taken is decreased by 20%.

name: Energy Wave (Magic)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 80% Magical DMG.

name: Erosion
desc: (Magical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 85% DMG and inflicts 2 random [Level 2 Attribute Debuffs] onthe target for 2 turns.

name: Execute
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 120% [AoE DMG] to all enemies in a straight line of 2 tiles in the target direction. If the target is [Injured], inflicts [{x}Resolve] and [{x}Healing Received] before attacking.

name: Execution Time
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Garcia deals 120% DMG. She gains 1 stack of [Rotational Acceleration] when defeating the target. If she has 6 stacks of [Rotational Acceleration] before attacking, her DMG is increased by 45%.

name: Executioner
desc: At the start of the turn, Garcia gains 1 stack of [Rotational Acceleration], up to 6 stacks. When reaching 3 stacks, increases Crit by 30%. At the start of the battle, she gains 1 stack of [Rotational Acceleration].

name: Eye for an Eye
desc: (Reaction) When Faycal is being attacked from the [front or side] by enemies who are not on adjacent tiles, he initiates a [Strike Back], dealing 100% DMG.

name: Fair Duel
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 180% DMG. Before attacking, dispels all [debuffs] on the character and all [buffs] on the target.

name: Fancy Footwork
desc: (Support) Takes 50% less [AoE DMG] and gains 2 [Dodge] attempts for 2 turns.

name: Fast Cover
desc: (Support) [Instant] Nergal swaps positions with a targeted ally, granting both of them [Physical Shield] with value equal to 50% of his P.ATK. Nergal take [physical attacks] for all allies within 1 tile. All effects

name: Fatal Attack (Curved)
desc: (Basic Attack) Fires a [Curved Shot] which deals 85% physical DMG and increases Crit DMG by 15%.

desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and increases Crit DMG by 15%.

name: Fatal Attack (Ranged)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and increases Crit DMG by 15%.

name: Fatal Reaping
desc: (Reaction) Performs [Assisting Attack] if any enemy within 3 tiles of a cross-shaped range around the character is [Dying] after being attacked by the character's allies. The Assisting Attack deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 50% of the targets' lost HP. The effect can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Faycal's Obsession
desc: Increases Faycal's ATK and DEF by 10%. Whenever he deals DMG, there is a 70% chance to inflict 1 random [Level 2 Debuff] to the target for 2 turns.

name: Feverish Attack (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 100% physical DMG and gains 20% [Life Steal].

name: Field
desc: (Aura) Decreases [AoE DMG] taken by all allies within 3 tiles around the character by 25%.

name: Fight to the Death
desc: (Passive) When [Dying], increases ATK and DEF by 20%.

name: Fire Pillar
desc: (Magical DMG) Selects a location and deals 70% [fire] [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 1-tile radius of the target location.

name: Fireball
desc: (Magical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 125% DMG and inflicts [Scorch] for 2 turns.

name: Firewalking
desc: (Reaction) Become immune to [Scorch] and [burning] tiles. When on a [burning] tile, the DMG taken is decreased by 10%. At the end of the turn, recovers 20% of the character's HP.

name: First Aid
desc: (Healing) Single-target healing. Heals 80% HP.

name: Flag of Justice
desc: Increases Gloria's ATK by 10%. When she loses [Flag Waving] aura, she gains [Potential Burst] for 2 turns. At the start of the battle, Gloria will auto-use [Longinus - Flag Waving] which grants [Flag Waving] aura.

name: Flagellant
desc: (Passive) Gains 1 stack of [Penance] after taking DMG. Each stack decreases DMG taken by 8%. This effect cannot be dispelled. Additionally recovers 1 NRG if the character has [Penance] stacks at the end of each turn.

name: Flame Shock
desc: (Magical DMG) Deals 60% [fire] [AoE DMG] to all enemies in a 3x4 area in the target direction.

name: Flame of Comrade
desc: Before attacking, gains [Armor Piercing). Increases M.ATK by 20% when there are 2 or more allies within a 2-tile radius of the character.

name: Flame of Despair
desc: M.ATK increases by 15%. When attacked and in the [Injured] state, deals 20% [fire] [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 2-tile radius of the character. Effect CD: 1 turn.

name: Flaming Meteor
desc: (Magical DMG) Prepares for 1 turn. Once casting the skill, deals 140% [fire] [AoE DMG] to all enemies within 3 tiles around the target, and [skips the turn].

desc: (Magical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 80% DMG and inflicts [{-}Move III] for 2 turns. If the targets have [{-}Move], additionallyinflicts[Frozen] for 2 turns.

desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. After being attacked, the character gains [ 2A Move II] for 2 turns.

name: Flurry of Stabs
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 45% DMG 3 times. When attacking, Crit increases by 20%.

name: Focused Defense
desc: Gains [Block]. While having a [physical shield], [block] chance is increased to 100%. At the start of the battle, gains a [Physical Shield] with value equal to 30% of the character's HP. This effect cannot be dispelled or immunized.

name: Focused Shot
desc: At the start of the turn, if there are no enemies within a 2-tile radius around the character, Crit increases by 35%  and P.ATK increases by 12% for 1 turn.

name: Foot Sniping
desc: (Physical DMG) Single-target attack. Deals 110% DMG and inflicts [{-}Move II] for 2 turns.

name: For Iria!
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Iria" allies in battle increases ATK by 10% and DEF by 20%. Allies' attacks deal 20% more DMG to the enemies affected by 3 or more [debuffs].

name: Forced March
desc: (Support) [Instant] Gains [ /A Move II] and [Control Immunity], and decreases the physical DMG taken by 100%. The effects last for 1 turn.

name: Fortification
desc: (Support) [Instant] skill. Summons a Box at the target tile.

name: Frenzied Slash (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Deals 110% DMG. If the target is defeated, the character recovers 1 NRG.

desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack from the [front], the DMG taken is decreased by 30%.

name: Full Draw
desc: (Support) After using this skill, [basic attack] DMG increases by 30%. At the end of the turn, NRG is not recovered.

name: Gale Breach
desc: (Physical DMG) [Instant] Rawiyah charges at 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range around her, dealing 30% DMG. Afterward, the skill switches to [Tropical Cyclone] for 2 turns. When she has [Tipsy], she inflicts [{x}Reaction Skills] on the target after the attack. This effect lasts for 2 turns.

name: Gale Dance
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 75% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 2-tile radius around the character. Before attacking, gains [{+}Crit II] for 2 turns.

name: Gale Footwork
desc: (Reaction) When attacked by a melee attack from [front or side], the character can interrupt the enemy's action, dealing 50% physical DMG and teleporting to the back of the closest ally within 3 tiles. Effect CD: 4 turns.

name: Gale Shooting (Ranged)
desc: (Basic Attack) Single-target attack. LilyWill deals 120% Physical DMG.

name: Gale Spin Attack
desc: (Physical DMG) Rawiyah deals 50% [AoE DMG] to all enemies withina 2-tile radius around her. After dealing DMG, inflicts [{-}P.DEF II] on the target for 2 turns. Subsequent attacks deal an additional 50% [AoE DMG].

name: Gale-Billow Volley
desc: (Physical DMG) Faycal deals 5 instances of 60% [AoE DMG] to random enemies within 2 tiles. DMG he deals to the same target repeatedly will be decreased by 50%.

name: Gash (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Single-target attack. Deals 85% physical DMG and knocks the target back by 2 tiles.

name: Global Guard
desc: (Support) Takes [physical attacks] for all other allies within a 2-tile radius of the character. When activated, the character gains [Counterattack] and [Block Enhancement] for 3 turns.

name: Goredrinker
desc: (Passive) After being attacked, gains [Goredrinker] for 2 turns.

name: Guard
desc: (Passive) Takes [physical attacks] for all other allies within a 2-tile radius of the character. When triggered, DEF is increased by 20%. Can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Guardian's Heart
desc: (Reaction) Takes [P.ATK] for all other allies within 1 tile of the character and performs a [Strike Back] on the attacker, dealing 70% physical DMG and knocking them back by 1 tile. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.

name: Guerrilla
desc: (Passive) ATK increases by 5%. After attacking, move again by 2 tiles. CD: 2 turns.

name: Hardening
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. After being attacked, the character gains [DMG Reduction II] for 2 turns.

desc: (Healing) Heals the target by 100% of M.ATK and dispels 1 [debuff] on the target.

desc: (Basic Attack) Col deals 100% DMG and she gains [Ignore Assist] if launching a (back attack].

desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%. When attacked by an enemy from [Lowland], the DMG taken is additionally decreased by 30%.

name: Highland Archer

name: Icy Shield

desc: (Passive) When [Dying], increases Movement by 2 tiles.

name: Survival Master
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and [Environmental DMG] taken is decreased by 70%.

name: Survivalist
desc: (Passive) If the character is [Dying] after being attacked, recovers 25% HP. Can be activated up to 1 time per round.

name: Sweeping Bash
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 80% DMG to all enemies within a 3x2 area in the target direction and inflicts [{-}P.DEF I], lasting for 2 turns.

name: Sword - Full Moon
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 90% AoE DMG to all enemies within 2 tiles of the character. If the target is [Injured], deals an additional 30% DMG. After casting the skill, gains [DMG Reduction II] for 2 turns. When having [Flag Waving] aura, the skill switches to [Longinus - Brilliance].

name: Sword - Gale
desc: (Physical DMG) Gloria selects 1 enemy within a cross-shaped range of herself, charging at them and dealing 120% DMG. For each tile Gloria moves, the DMG increases by 10%, up to 50% upon attack. If Gloria has a [Flag Waving] aura, the skill switches to [Longinus - Thrust].

name: Sword of Convallaria
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "Sword of Convallaria" allies in battle, increases ATK by 10%, DEF by 20%, and DMG dealt by 8%, and decreases their DMG taken by 8%.

name: Sword of Justice (Melee)
desc: (Basic Attack) Single-target attack. Gloria deals 100% Physical DMG. When she attacks from the [front], increases DMG dealt to 130%. When [Flag Waving] aura is activated, the skill switches to [Lance of Justice].

name: Take Arms!
desc: (Support) Other allies within 4 tiles of Edda restore 1 NRG. When she performs an [Assisting Attack], her DMG increases by 130%. Increases the maximum number of times the effect can be triggered per turn by 2. The effect lasts for 1 turn.

name: Target Weakness
desc: Deals 35% more DMG when attacking an enemy with a [debuff].

name: Taste of Blood
desc: (Support) [Instant] Garcia recovers 30% HP, dispels 3 [Debuffs] on herself, and gains [Potential Burst], lasting for 1 turn.

name: Tearing Whirlwind
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 90% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within 1 tile around the character and inflicts [{x}Healing Received] on them, lasting 2 turns.

name: Tenacious
desc: (Passive) When [Injured], increases ATK and DEF by 8%.

name: Tenacity
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack from a [Counter Role] character, the DMG taken is decreased by 25%.

name: Terminate
desc: (Passive) When attacking [Dying] enemies, increases ATK by 25%.

name: The Protected
desc: (Passive) The character gains 15% bonus ATK and 30% bonus DEF while not affected by any [debuff] and affected by at least 3 [buffs].

name: Thorny Armor
desc: (Passive) Upon receiving Physical Attacks, deals [Piercing DMG] to the attacker equal to 50% of the character's P.DEF.

name: Thunderbolt Assault
desc: (Physical DMG) Deals 75% [AoE DMG] to all enemies within a 2-tile radius around the character and dispels 2 [buffs].

name: Tiger Charge
desc: (Physical DMG) Selects 1 spot within a cross-shaped range around the character, charges to the location, and deals 60% [AoE DMG] to enemies within a 3x3 areain the target direction,

name: Toughness
desc: (Passive) Gains immunity to the effect of [Injured] and [Dying].

name: Traceless Shadow
desc: (Support) Gains 1 [Dodge] for 1 turn. Upon a successful [dodge], teleports to the attacker's back, dealing 100% Physical DMG, and gains [dodge] again for 1 turn.

name: Tranquilizer
desc: (Support) [Instant] Inflicts [Sleep] on the target for 2 turns.

name: Tropical Cyclone
desc: (Physical DMG) Rawiyah deals 140% DMG. For each [Debuff] the target has, DMG is increased by 10%, up to 50%, after which this skill switches to [Gale Breach].

name: Try This!
desc: (Healing) Heals other allies within 3 tiles around the character, restoring 10% HP and 2 NRG.

name: Unsheathe
desc: (Passive) Before initiating an active melee attack, deals magical DMG equal to 40% of P.ATK. If the target has a [Shield], inflicts [Vulnerable II] that lasts for 2 turns before attacking. All the effects can be triggered up to 1 time per round.

name: Vantage Point
desc: (Passive) Increases ATK by 10% when attacking from the [Highland].

name: Volunteer
desc: [AoE DMG] taken is decreased by 20%. If other allies within 6 tiles around the character are [Dying], increases Movement by 2 tiles and SPD by 150. At the start of the turn, the CD of all skills is decreased by 1 turn.

name: Vow of Justice
desc: (Leader's Aura) For all "The Union" allies in battle, ATK is increased by 10%, DEF is increased by 20%. When performing an active attack, DMG is increased by 12%. When being Struck Back, DMG taken is decreased by 24%.

name: Wall of Flame
desc: (Magical DMG) Selects 1 spot within a cross-shaped range around the character, deals 70% [AoE DMG] to all enemies in a horizontal row of 5 tiles, and changes the tiles into [burning]. The effect lasts for 2 turns.

name: Warm-Up
desc: (Passive) When on [Standby], gains [{+}Move I] and [Climb] for 1 turn.

name: Weak Spot Protection
desc: (Reaction) When hit by an active attack, the DMG taken is decreased by 8%, and the chance of taking critical hits is decreased by 30%.

name: Weakening Attack
desc: (Passive) After attacking, gains a 50% chance to inflict [{-}ATK II] on the target, lasting 2 turns.

name: Weapon Eroder
desc: (Piercing DMG) Single-target attack. Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 30% of thetarget's HP and theninflicts [{-}ATK II] for 2 turns.

name: Whirlwind Axe
desc: (Physical DMG) Alexei deals 90% DMG to all enemies within 2 tiles around himself. Every enemy defeated by this skill reduces the CD of the [Trait] effect by 1 turn.

name: White Sword (Ranged)
desc: (Basic Attack) Single-target attack. Dantalion deals Magical DMG equal to 90% of his P.ATK.

name: Wild Howl
desc: (Piercing DMG) Alexei deals DMG equal to 40% of his M.ATK and inflicts [{-}Move II] and [{-}ATK III] to all enemies within a 3-tile radius of him, lasting for 2 turns.

name: Will to Survive
desc: (Passive) If the character is [Dying] at the start of the turn, recovers 50% HP and 2 NRG. Effect CD: 2 turns.

name: Windwalking
desc: (Passive) Increases Crit DMG by 10%. The maximum range of [ranged skills] increases by 1 tile.

name: Wine Barrel Casting
desc: (Physical DMG) [Instant] Edda deals 20% DMG to all enemies within 1 tile of the target and changes the tiles into [Liquor].

name: Wipe Out
desc: (Physical DMG) Col deals 60% DMG 3 times. Before attacking, when there are no allies within a 2-tile radius, Col gains [Ignore Assist]. When defeating a target, she gains [Dodge], lasting for 1 turn.
